changeSet.sql: UPDATE statistics st SET uuid = (SELECT uuid FROM item it WHERE it.item_id = st.item_id);

changeSet.author: Igor Marchenko
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM statistics WHERE uuid IS NULL;

changeSet.author: Igor Marchenko
changeSet.sql: update authors au set uuid = ( select ep.uuid from eperson ep where au.surname_en is not null and ((ep.lastname = au.surname_uk and ep.firstname = au.initials_uk) or (ep.lastname = au.surname_ru and ep.firstname = au.initials_ru) or (ep.lastname = au.surname_en and ep.firstname = au.initials_en)) limit 1)

changeSet.author: Igor Marchenko
changeSet.sql: update authors set uuid = gen_random_uuid() where uuid is null;

changeSet.author: Igor Marchenko
changeSet.sql: insert into dspaceobject(uuid) select uuid from authors where uuid not in (select * from dspaceobject);
